articles.title: Dodge Demon With 1,000-HP 426 Hemi Hellephant Swap Hits Dyno - Motor1
articles.description: Does the engine really make that much power?
articles.content: The 426 cubic-inch Hemi V8. Few engines in the world have such a storied history and devoted following. Its even more impressive when you consider this engine in 426 cubic-inch displacement anyway ha… [+2753 chars]

articles.title: 'Final Fantasy VII Remake' and the curse of remade soundtracks - Engadget
articles.description: I listen to game music pretty often — and a large chunk of it is from the Final Fantasy game series, from the original right through to this year’s remaster of a decades-old game. It had some of the major battle themes and catchier background songs but it’s n…
articles.content: While I had to dig out my USB CD drive to put the thing on devices I’d actually listen to, the sampler has a good mix of remade tracks from the original and entirely new arrangements. It had some of … [+2413 chars]
